item.title: UniGAD: Unifying Multi-level Graph Anomaly Detection
item.description: UniGAD unifies multi-level graph anomaly detection, improving accuracy and zero-shot transferability by jointly modeling node, edge, and graph anomalies via a novel subgraph sampler and GraphStitch Ne…
